Description: Valley of the Tombs of the Kings, Thebes; broken ridge with two palm trees on its crest to right, vulture on rock in foreground, beyond deep hollow from which rise range of bare cliffs from shadow into sunlight. 1839 Watercolour with graphite
Bibliographic references: Binyon 1898-1907 / Catalogue of drawings by British artists, and artists of foreign origin working in Great Britain (31)
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: William James Müller (sale Chrristie's 1.iv.1846/ lot 28)
